# gitea_repository (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing Gitea repository.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the repository.
- `owner` (String) The owner of the repository (username or organization name).

### Read-Only

- `allow_fast_forward_only_merge` (Boolean) Whether fast-forward only merging is allowed.
- `allow_manual_merge` (Boolean) Whether manual merging is allowed.
- `allow_merge_commits` (Boolean) Whether merge commits are allowed.
- `allow_rebase` (Boolean) Whether rebase merging is allowed.
- `allow_rebase_explicit` (Boolean) Whether explicit rebase merging is allowed.
- `allow_rebase_update` (Boolean) Whether rebase update is allowed.
- `allow_squash_merge` (Boolean) Whether squash merging is allowed.
- `archived` (Boolean) Whether the repository is archived.
- `autodetect_manual_merge` (Boolean) Whether manual merge is autodetected.
- `avatar_url` (String) The URL of the repository's avatar.
- `clone_url` (String) The HTTPS URL to clone the repository.
- `default_allow_maintainer_edit` (Boolean) Whether maintainers can edit pull requests by default.
- `default_branch` (String) The default branch of the repository.
- `default_delete_branch_after_merge` (Boolean) Whether branches are deleted after merge by default.
- `default_merge_style` (String) The default merge style for pull requests.
- `description` (String) The description of the repository.
- `empty` (Boolean) Whether the repository is empty.
- `fork` (Boolean) Whether the repository is a fork.
- `forks_count` (Number) The number of forks of the repository.
- `full_name` (String) The full name of the repository in `owner/repo` format.
- `has_actions` (Boolean) Whether the repository has actions enabled.
- `has_issues` (Boolean) Whether the repository has issues enabled.
- `has_packages` (Boolean) Whether the repository has packages enabled.
- `has_projects` (Boolean) Whether the repository has projects enabled.
- `has_pull_requests` (Boolean) Whether the repository has pull requests enabled.
- `has_releases` (Boolean) Whether the repository has releases enabled.
- `has_wiki` (Boolean) Whether the repository has wiki enabled.
- `html_url` (String) The URL to view the repository in the web UI.
- `id` (Number) The numeric ID of the repository.
- `ignore_whitespace_conflicts` (Boolean) Whether the repository ignores whitespace conflicts.
- `internal` (Boolean) Whether the repository is internal.
- `mirror` (Boolean) Whether the repository is a mirror.
- `object_format_name` (String) The object format name of the underlying git repository (sha1 or sha256).
- `open_issues_count` (Number) The number of open issues in the repository.
- `open_pr_counter` (Number) The number of open pull requests in the repository.
- `private` (Boolean) Whether the repository is private.
- `release_counter` (Number) The number of releases in the repository.
- `size` (Number) The size of the repository in KB.
- `ssh_url` (String) The SSH URL to clone the repository.
- `stars_count` (Number) The number of stars the repository has.
- `template` (Boolean) Whether the repository is a template.
- `watchers_count` (Number) The number of watchers the repository has.
- `website` (String) The website URL associated with the repository.
